document_data.name: Nezram's emerald energy shield
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nezram's emerald energy shield''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that caused the target to be covered by an [[emerald]] green hued layer of protective energy.
document_data.Effects: This shield protected against effects causing deafness and sonic type attacks.
document_data.History: This spell was presumably developed by [[Nezram]].
